typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE as string,
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		CHANNEL_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		GL_CODE as string,
		TRANSACTION_DT as timestamp,
		FI_START_DATE as timestamp,
		FI_END_DATE as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		FI_TERM_MATURITY as integer,
		FI_TERM_UOM as string,
		RATE_RESET_TYPE as string,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		FI_FLOOR_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		BU_CODE as string,
		TENOR_MONTHS as integer,
		CLOSED_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		REPRICING_FREQ as integer,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND as string,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE as string,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		LOAN_INDICATOR as string,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND as string,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		BU_CODE_DERIVE as string,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_EOP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_AVE as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_INT as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FTP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_OBS as string,
		OPEN_DATE as timestamp,
		MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FiInstrDim
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID as string,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		SETID as string,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR as integer,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD as integer,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RunControlTbl
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		SOURCE_ID as string,
		DESCR as string,
		SEQ_NO as integer,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as integer,
		DESCRLONG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProcessInstanceTbl
source(output(
		SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		SRC_DATE as string,
		ACCOUNT_NUMBER as string,
		SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE as string,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_ORIG_CURR as decimal(19,4),
		ORIG_ACCT_AMOUNT_CURR as string,
		BU_CODE as string,
		SOURCE_PROD_CODE as string,
		ACCT_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_CNY as decimal(19,4),
		TENOR_MONTHS as integer,
		TENOR_DAYS as integer,
		OPEN_DATE as timestamp,
		CLOSED_DATE as timestamp,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		REPRICING_FREQ as integer,
		CUST_NUMBER as string,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND as string,
		BASE_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		BASE_RATE_TYPE as string,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_CODE as string,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_DESCR as string,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		ACCT_RATE_TYPE as string,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		ACCT_OUTSTAND_BAL as decimal(19,4),
		LOAN_INDICATOR as string,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		CUST_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_CURRENCY_CODE as string,
		NEXT_ROLLOVER_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_TERM_MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		CONV_ACCT_AMOUNT as decimal(19,4),
		LAST_ROLLOVER_DATE as timestamp,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FiAvgbal
FinInstrFilter, RunControlTbl join(FiInstrDim@ENTITY_ID == RunControlTbl@ENTITY_ID
	&& FiInstrDim@FISCAL_YEAR == RunControlTbl@FISCAL_YEAR
	&& FiInstrDim@ACCOUNTING_PERIOD == RunControlTbl@ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FiInstrJoinRunControl
FiInstrJoinRunControl, FiAvgbalFilter join(PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID == SRC_SYSTEM_ID
	&& FI_INSTRUMENT_ID == ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FinInstrJoinFiAvgbal
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = FiInstrDim@ENTITY_ID,
		FI_INTRUMENT_ID = FI_INSTRUMENT_ID,
		FISCAL_YEAR = FiInstrDim@FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD = FiInstrDim@ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID,
		ACCOUNT_ID = GL_ACCOUNT_INT,
		SOURCE_ID,
		GL_ACCOUNT,
		PRODUCT,
		BRANCH_ID = FiInstrDim@BRANCH_ID,
		FI_START_DATE,
		FI_END_DATE,
		ORG_UNIT_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		CHANNEL_ID,
		GL_CODE,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC = FiInstrDim@CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC,
		TENOR_MONTHS = FiInstrDim@TENOR_MONTHS,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE = FiInstrDim@LAST_REPRICING_DATE,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE = FiInstrDim@NEXT_REPRICING_DATE,
		REPRICING_FREQ = FiInstrDim@REPRICING_FREQ,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE = FiInstrDim@REG_LOAN_GRADE,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE = FiInstrDim@HO_LOAN_GRADE,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND = FiInstrDim@NPL_BORROWER_IND,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE = FiInstrDim@BASE_RATE_TYPE,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE = FiInstrDim@INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE,
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE = FiInstrDim@NON_STD_FTP_RATE,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE = FiInstrDim@ACCT_STATUS_CODE,
		LOAN_INDICATOR = FiInstrDim@LOAN_INDICATOR,
		SUSPENED_INTEREST_IND = FiInstrDim@SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND,
		BRANCH_ID = FiInstrDim@BRANCH_ID,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH = FiInstrDim@CUST_NAME_ENGLISH,
		BU_CODE_DERIVE,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
		GL_ACCOUNT_EOP,
		GL_ACCOUNT_AVE,
		GL_ACCOUNT_INT,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FTP,
		GL_ACCOUNT_OBS,
		OPEN_DATE = FiInstrDim@OPEN_DATE,
		MATURITY_DATE = FiInstrDim@MATURITY_DATE,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE = FiInstrDim@PROCESS_INSTANCE,
		ENTITY_ID = RunControlTbl@ENTITY_ID,
		FISCAL_YEAR = RunControlTbl@FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD = RunControlTbl@ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID,
		ASOF_DT = RunControlTbl@ASOF_DT,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC = RunControlTbl@CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		SETID,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH,
		SRC_SYSTEM_ID,
		SRC_DATE,
		ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
		SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_ORIG_CURR,
		ORIG_ACCT_AMOUNT_CURR,
		BU_CODE = FiAvgbal@BU_CODE,
		SOURCE_PROD_CODE,
		ACCT_RM_CODE,
		ACCT_AMOUNT_CNY,
		TENOR_MONTHS = FiAvgbal@TENOR_MONTHS,
		TENOR_DAYS,
		OPEN_DATE = FiAvgbal@OPEN_DATE,
		CLOSED_DATE = FiAvgbal@CLOSED_DATE,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE,
		MATURITY_DATE = FiAvgbal@MATURITY_DATE,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE = FiAvgbal@LAST_REPRICING_DATE,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE = FiAvgbal@NEXT_REPRICING_DATE,
		REPRICING_FREQ = FiAvgbal@REPRICING_FREQ,
		CUST_NUMBER,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE = FiAvgbal@REG_LOAN_GRADE,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE = FiAvgbal@HO_LOAN_GRADE,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND = FiAvgbal@NPL_BORROWER_IND,
		BASE_RATE,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE = FiAvgbal@BASE_RATE_TYPE,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_CODE,
		FINANCIAL_CAT_DESCR,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE = FiAvgbal@INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE,
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE = FiAvgbal@NON_STD_FTP_RATE,
		ACCT_RATE_TYPE,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE = FiAvgbal@ACCT_STATUS_CODE,
		ACCT_OUTSTAND_BAL,
		LOAN_INDICATOR = FiAvgbal@LOAN_INDICATOR,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND = FiAvgbal@SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND,
		BRANCH_ID = FiAvgbal@BRANCH_ID,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH = FiAvgbal@CUST_NAME_ENGLISH,
		CUST_RM_CODE,
		ACCT_CURRENCY_CODE,
		NEXT_ROLLOVER_DATE,
		NEXT_TERM_MATURITY_DATE,
		CONV_ACCT_AMOUNT,
		LAST_ROLLOVER_DATE,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE = FiAvgbal@FI_INTEREST_RATE,
		ENTITY_ID = ProcessInstanceTbl@ENTITY_ID,
		SOURCE_ID,
		DESCR,
		SEQ_NO,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE = ProcessInstanceTbl@PROCESS_INSTANCE,
		DESCRLONG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
FiAvgbal alterRow(insertIf(SRC_AMOUNT_TYPE=='26 , 76'),
	insertIf(ACCT_AMOUNT_ORIG_CURR!=0)) ~> FiAvgbalFilter
ProcessInstanceTbl alterRow(insertIf(SOURCE_ID=='PSI')) ~> ProcessInstanceFilter
FiInstrDim alterRow(insertIf(SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND=='N'),
	insertIf(GL_ACCOUNT!='NA')) ~> FinInstrFilter
FinInstrJoinFiAvgbal, ProcessInstanceFilter join(FiInstrDim@ENTITY_ID == ProcessInstanceTbl@ENTITY_ID
	&& FiInstrDim@PROCESS_INSTANCE == ProcessInstanceTbl@PROCESS_INSTANCE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select1 derive(FI_BALANCE_AMT_RC = isNull('FI_BALANCE_AMT_RC')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		SOURCE_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		CHANNEL_ID as string,
		GL_CODE as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC as decimal(18,0),
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC as decimal(18,0),
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_RC as decimal(18,0),
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID = FI_INTRUMENT_ID,
		FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID,
		ACCOUNT_ID,
		SOURCE_ID,
		GL_ACCOUNT,
		PRODUCT,
		BRANCH_ID,
		ORG_UNIT_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		CHANNEL_ID,
		GL_CODE,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_RC,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
